name: Deadwood Tobacco Co. - The Girl With No Name Robusto Extra
additionalNotes:
Several years ago, Drew Estate introduced a shop exclusive brand to a Deadwood, South Dakota retailer known as Deadwood Tobacco. These were a series of Maduro cigars containing aromatic tobaccos that achieved a cult following nationwide. In 2016, Drew Estate would take the line national and make it a 
Today, we turn our attention to one of the original Deadwood Tobacco releases that went national – the Deadwood Tobacco Sweet Jane in the Corona Gorda size. Production for the Sweet Jane comes out of Drew Estate’s La Gran Fabrica facility in Estelí, Nicaragua.
